trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> objects that represent the cells in a single row of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta di <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> gli oggetti che rappresentano le celle in una singola riga di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: Use the HtmlTableCellCollection class to programmatically manage a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> objects that represent the cells of a single row in an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la classe HtmlTableCellCollection per gestire a livello di codice un insieme di <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>gli oggetti che rappresentano le celle di una singola riga in un <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>

trans-unit.source: This class is commonly used to add, remove, or modify the contents of a cell in a row of an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe è utilizzata comunemente per aggiungere, rimuovere o modificare il contenuto di una cella in una riga di un <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A> property that contains a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Un <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>controllo contiene un <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A>proprietà che contiene una raccolta di <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>oggetti.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> object represents an individual row in the table.
trans-unit.target: Ogni <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>oggetto rappresenta una singola riga nella tabella.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> object contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Cells%2A> property that represents a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> objects.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>oggetto contiene un <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Cells%2A>proprietà che rappresenta una raccolta di <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>oggetti.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Cells%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>

trans-unit.source: These objects, in turn, represent the individual cells of a row.
trans-unit.target: Questi oggetti, a sua volta, rappresentano le singole celle di una riga.

trans-unit.source: To retrieve an individual cell, first get the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> object that represents the row containing the cell in the table (from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control).
trans-unit.target: Per recuperare una singola cella, ottenere il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>oggetto che rappresenta la riga contenente la cella nella tabella (dal <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A>insieme il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>controllo).</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>

trans-unit.source: You can then get the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> object that represents the cell in the row (from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Cells%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> object).
trans-unit.target: È quindi possibile ottenere il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>oggetto che rappresenta la cella nella riga (dal <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Cells%2A>insieme del <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>oggetto).</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Cells%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> object to the end of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> oggetto alla fine del <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to add the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> object to the end of an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per aggiungere l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>oggetto alla fine di un <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>

trans-unit.source: If you want to insert an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> object in a specified location in the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se si desidera inserire un <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>oggetto in un percorso specificato nella raccolta, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection.Insert%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> da aggiungere alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Removes all <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> objects from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove tutti <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> oggetti dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove all <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> objects from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> collection and reset the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection.Count%2A> property to `0`.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per rimuovere tutti <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>oggetti dal <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>raccolta e reimposta il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection.Count%2A>proprietà `0`.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection.Count%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method removes the cells from a row, but it does not remove the row from the table.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questo metodo rimuove le celle da una riga, ma non rimuove la riga dalla tabella.

trans-unit.source: To remove a row from the table, be sure to also remove the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> object that represents the row from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: Per rimuovere una riga dalla tabella, assicurarsi di rimuovere anche il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>oggetto che rappresenta la riga dal <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A>insieme il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>

trans-unit.source: Copies the items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> collection to the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, beginning with the specified index in the <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Copia gli elementi dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> insieme all'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, a partire dall'indice specificato nella <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to copy the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> collection into the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, starting at the specified index of the array.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per copiare il contenuto del <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>insieme nell'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, a partire dall'indice specificato della matrice.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `array` parameter must be a zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Il `array` parametro deve essere in base zero <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: In base zero <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> che riceve gli elementi copiati dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The first index in the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> to receive the items.
trans-unit.target: Il primo indice nell'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> degli elementi.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero di <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> gli oggetti di <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: Use the Count property to determine the number of cells contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà Count per determinare il numero di celle contenute nel <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>

trans-unit.source: The Count property is commonly used when iterating through the collection to determine the upper bound.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà Count viene comunemente utilizzata quando si scorre la raccolta per determinare il limite superiore.

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> gli oggetti di <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_0" name="0" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_0" name="0" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implemented object that contains all <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implementato l'oggetto che contiene tutti <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> gli oggetti di <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implemented object that can be iterated through to retrieve the contents of each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per creare un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implementato l'oggetto che può scorrere per recuperare il contenuto di ciascun elemento di <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà per ottenere l'elemento attualmente fa riferimento nella raccolta.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move to the next item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo per spostare l'elemento successivo della raccolta.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move the enumerator to the initial position.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo per spostare la posizione iniziale dell'enumeratore.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method must be called after creating the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implemented object, or after using the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Il <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo deve essere chiamato dopo la creazione di <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implementato l'oggetto, oppure dopo l'utilizzo il <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>per spostare l'enumeratore al primo elemento nella raccolta.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the item represented by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is undefined.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, l'elemento rappresentato dal <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà non è definita.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implemented object that contains all <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implementato l'oggetto che contiene tutti <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> gli oggetti di <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> object at the specified index location of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> oggetto in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato del <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: Use the Insert method to add the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> object to an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo Insert per aggiungere l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>l'oggetto in un <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>raccolta in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>

trans-unit.source: If you want to simply append an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> object to the end of the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se si desidera aggiungere un <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>oggetto alla fine della raccolta, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection.Add%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>

trans-unit.source: The location in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> at which to add the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> in cui aggiungere il <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> raccolta è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `false` to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> collection can be written to in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà restituisce sempre `false` per indicare che il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>raccolta può essere scritta in tutti i casi.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> for all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>per tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> collection is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'accesso per il <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> raccolta è sincronizzata (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> and is overridden to always return `false` to indicate that access to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> collection is not synchronized (not thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è derivata da <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>e viene eseguito l'override per restituire sempre `false` per indicare che l'accesso al <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>raccolta è sincronizzata (non thread-safe).</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the IsSynchronized property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla proprietà IsSynchronized, vedere il <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà del <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>interfaccia.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> for all cases, which indicates that access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> is not synchronized (not thread safe).
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>per tutti i casi, a indicare che l'accesso al <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> non è sincronizzato (non thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> object at the specified index from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> oggetto in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: Use this indexer to get an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare l'indicizzatore per ottenere un <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>dall'oggetto di <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>

trans-unit.source: You can access an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> object at a specified index by using simple array notation.
trans-unit.target: È possibile accedere a un <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>oggetto in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato utilizzando la notazione di matrice semplice.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The collection is zero-based; therefore, the first element in the collection contains an index value of `0`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > La raccolta è in base zero; pertanto, il primo elemento nella raccolta contiene un valore di indice `0`.

trans-unit.source: An ordinal index value that specifies the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> to return.
trans-unit.target: Un valore di indice ordinale che specifica il <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> da restituire.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> that represents a cell contained in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> che rappresenta una cella contenuta nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> dall'oggetto di <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per rimuovere l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>dall'oggetto di <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you specify an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> object that does not exist in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> collection, no item is removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se si specifica un <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>oggetto che non esiste nel <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>insieme, nessun elemento viene rimosso dalla raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> per rimuovere il <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> object at the specified index from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove il <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> oggetto in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> object at the specified index from an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per rimuovere il <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>oggetto in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato da un <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>

trans-unit.source: The index number is zero-based; therefore, the first item in the collection has an index value of `0`.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di indice è in base zero. Pertanto, il primo elemento nella raccolta ha un valore di indice di `0`.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you specify an index that is outside the range of index values, an exception is raised.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se si specifica un indice non compreso nell'intervallo dei valori di indice, viene generata un'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'indice del <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell"> </xref> per rimuovere il <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified index is outside the range of index values in the collection.
trans-unit.target: L'indice specificato è compreso nell'intervallo di valori di indice nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto che può essere utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso al <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The object returned in this implementation is the current instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto restituito in questa implementazione è l'istanza corrente della <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCellCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the SyncRoot property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla proprietà SyncRoot, vedere il <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà del <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>interfaccia.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che può essere usato per sincronizzare l'accesso alla raccolta.
